transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, haan ji.
Executive: IndiaMART bol rahe ho?
Customer: Haan ji, IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan, main Colors se bol raha hu.
Customer: Kahan se?
Executive: Colors se bol raha hu, Colors.
Customer: Colors, hum ek baar register number bataiye.
Executive: Ji madam, number boliye. 866
Executive: 946
Customer: 942
Executive: 5521
Customer: 5521?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Colors and Paint Industry se bol rahe ho?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Theek hai ye. Wo actually mera relationship manager kaun the abhi?
Executive: Ah, filhaal to pehle to Vivek Sharma the, abhi wo change ho gaya, main aapko batata hu.
Customer: Unko jara follow call karne ke liye, kyunki wo mera bhi company
Executive: Jo matlab Colors Industry thi na, usko bhi private limited kar diya hai.
Customer: Achha. To GST ke ek baar unko call karwata hu. Private limited ho gaya aapka?
Customer: Haan, private limited ho gaya abhi.
Executive: To GST bhi updated hai na? Aap updated GST bhej do. Main Vivek ji ko bolta hu call karne ke liye.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know his relationship manager.

- Wants a follow-up call regarding company updates.



Resolution:

- Executive informed about previous relationship manager.

- Executive asked to share updated GST details.

- Executive assured a call from Vivek.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will arrange a call from Vivek.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- relationship manager, gst, private limited company
